Inter briše Lautarovu izlaznu klauzulu
Novim, pojačanim ugovorom, razume se...

02 Nov 2019


Inter je spreman da odbije Barselonu po pitanju Lautara Martineza čak i po cenu da ostane bez mogućnosti da angažuje prvi i najveću želju Antonija Kontea - Artura Vidala. Kako javlja Gazeta delo Sport Nerazuri će ponuditi novi ugovor argentinskom napadaču i tražiće izbacivanje otkupne klauzule, koja trenutno iznosi 111.000.000 evra. 

Bez obzira što klauzulu mogu da aktiviraju samo klubovi iz inostranstva, i to isključivou periodu 1. jul - 15. jul, u Interu ne žele da rizikuju i po svaku cenu pokušavaju da "blindiraju" Lautara. 
Podsetimo, Barsa je pitala za 22-godišnjeg napadača koji se raspucao ove sezone. Nezvanično, nuđena je određena svota novca i pomenuti Vidal, čak u nekim kombinacijama i Ivan Rakitić, međutim Milanezi su očito procenili da im je zadržavanje Martineza prioritet. Barselonina ideja bila je da dozvoli jednom od dvojice vezista da ode u Inter, te da se Italijani tom prilikom obavežu da na leto bude završen posao oko Lautara Martineza. Ali od toga, očito, neće biti ništa...
Prema trenutnom ugovoru koji važi do 2023. Lautaro zaarađuje "svega" 1.500.000 evra godišnje. Po novom, ta cifra bila bi značajno povećana, a izlazna klauzula izbačena u potpunosti ili duplirana.
Interesovanje za Lautara, pored Barse, pokazivao je Mančester Junajted.

Foto: Reuters

Inter deletes Lautar's exit clause
The new, enhanced contract means ...

02 Nov 2019


Inter are ready to turn down Barcelona for Lautar Martinez, even at the cost of losing the ability to engage Antonio Conte's first and greatest desire - Arthur Vidal. According to the Gazette, Sport Nerazuri will offer a new contract to the Argentine striker and will seek the removal of the buyout clause, which currently stands at 111,000,000 euros.

Despite the fact that the clause can only be activated by clubs from abroad, and exclusively for the period July 1 - July 15, in Inter they do not want to take risks and at all costs try to "blind" Lautar.
Recall, Barsa asked about the 22-year-old striker who burst into tears this season. Unofficially, a certain amount of money and the aforementioned Vidal were offered, even in some combinations, by Ivan Rakitic, however, the Milanese apparently felt that retaining Martinez was a priority. Barcelona's idea was to allow one of the two midfielders to go to Inter, and the Italians would be obliged to complete the work on Lautar Martinez for the summer. But of course, there will be nothing ...
Under the current contract, valid until 2023, Lautaro earns "just" € 1,500,000 a year. Under the new one, that figure would be significantly increased and the exit clause ejected in full or duplicated.
Manchester United showed interest in Lautar, besides Barca.
